channel.title: Concepts on Open Cluster Management
channel.description: Recent content in Concepts on Open Cluster Management

item.title: Architecture
item.description: This page tells you the architecture and basic concepts in open-cluster-management. Hub cluster Klusterlet Managed cluster Application lifecycle Governance and risk Hub cluster The hub cluster is the common term that is used to define the central controller that runs in a Kubernetes cluster. The hub cluster aggregates information from multiple clusters by using an asynchronous work request model. Klusterlet The klusterlet is an agent running on the cluster managed by the hub.

item.title: Roadmap
item.description: This page tells you the roadmap for components in open-cluster-management. Work in progress
